programme.title: Hey Arnold!: It Girl/Deconstructing Arnold

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: El equipo viaja a Atlanta para investigar el asesinato de una mujer, descubriendo que el criminal no trabaja solo.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Varias parejas que están en proceso de adoptar niños en Seattle empiezan a ser asesinadas. La UAC busca a un criminal que tiene un perfil muy pronunciado de instinto maternal, aunque asesino. Por otro lado, García tiene miedo de hablar con Kevin.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Un niño llamado Ángel aparece en medio del desierto con profundas cargas psicológicas al haber sido capturado por un psicópata. El niño no puede articular palabras, pero él es el único que puede dar una pista para salvar a otro niño desaparecido.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando una mujer en Oregon es encontrada muerta en un asilo, la UAC se da cuenta que la víctima es parte de una serie de asesinatos rituales góticos y que el asesino podría ser satanista.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: El equipo de NCIS investiga el asesinato de un teniente comandante de la Armada mientras lidia con el esposo devastado. Mientras tanto, Ziva reevalúa su futuro cuando regresa Ray.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Gibbs se enfrenta a un arma durante una parada rutinaria para tomar café, lo que lo obliga a cuestionar decisiones pasadas y presentes.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Cuando un capitán de la Marina es encontrado muerto con un disfraz inusual debajo de su uniforme, NCIS descubre una sociedad secreta de superhéroes reales y debe rastrear al villano.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Un reservista naval de alta seguridad es encontrado muerto. Gibbs colabora con la Dra. Samantha Ryan de PsyOps para descubrir la verdad detrás del posible suicidio. Mientras tanto, DiNozzo discute con contabilidad tras ver el salario de McGee.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Quien se aleja
programme.desc: Cuando la inmunidad diplomática complica un caso de abuso infantil para Danny y Baez, Frank interviene, a pesar de no tener jurisdicción en el caso.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Dentro y fuera
programme.desc: Mientras investigan el asesinato de un líder de pandilla, Danny y Baez descubren que el presunto asesino es un ex convicto que tiene una relación romántica con su oficial de libertad condicional, quien podría estar ayudando a encubrir el crimen.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Almas perdidas
programme.desc: Mientras investigan el asesinato de un conductor ebrio que mató a una madre y su hijo, Danny y Baez se debaten entre cumplir con su deber y buscar justicia al descubrir la conexión entre el sospechoso y la víctima.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Apuesta alta
programme.desc: Cuando el hermano de Linda, Jimmy (Kevin Dillon), se mete en problemas con la mafia, le suplica a Danny que lo ayude a mantenerse a salvo hasta que la situación se calme

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando una mujer en Oregon es encontrada muerta en un asilo, la UAC se da cuenta que la víctima es parte de una serie de asesinatos rituales góticos y que el asesino podría ser satanista.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La hermana de Morgan ve a una muchacha que se parece a su prima supuestamente muerta. Morgan tiene que confesar a su familia la mentira que él dijo, y el UAC vuelve a abrir el caso.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A hit and run call results in the intoxicated suspect being coaxed out of his car at gun-point. Officers respond to a stabbing and the victim is rushed to the hospital by paramedics. Officers give a tour of a newly renovated jail in Maricopa County, AZ.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man with a suspended license flees a routine traffic stop on foot. Deputies respond to a battered woman after receiving a 911 hang up call. A sting operation nets a suspected drug dealer.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies confront a man holding a knife to his roommate’s neck over a prior argument. A suspect runs from deputies on a warrant charge. Suspected robbers are pulled over by deputies.

programme.title: COPS

programme.title: Ella está encantada

programme.title: Treintona, soltera y fantástica

programme.title: Emma
programme.desc: Emma es una traviesa joven hermosa que le arregla citas a sus amigas solteras, y arma desastres en sus vidas, hasta que ella misma se enamora. Gwyneth Paltrow protagoniza esta querida adaptación de la novela de Jane Austen.

programme.title: Como si fuera cierto
programme.desc: David Abbott, un arquitecto solitario, encuentra un increíble apartamento en San Francisco, solo para descubrir que está embrujado por el espíritu del inquilino anterior, Elizabeth Masterson, una doctora superdotada que está en coma.

programme.title: Una boda complicada
programme.desc: Meg y Tyler nunca se llevaron bien entre sí, pero pronto tendrán que trabajar juntos para salvar el casamiento de sus mejores amigos. Ellos se darán cuenta de que hacen un buen equipo y que quizá hay lugar en este casamiento para un poco de romance.

programme.title: Navidad epoca para amar
programme.desc: Una escritora de romances, famosa por sus obras ambientadas en navidad, queda varada por la nieve en Cranberry Falls, donde queda involucrada en un triángulo amoroso entre un amor de su niñez y el periodista que busca entrevistarla.

programme.title: La niñera y el presidente
programme.desc: Una cosmetóloga de Nueva York, tomada por error como maestra de ciencia, recibe una propuesta de trabajo para darles clase a los hijos de un dictador de Europa Oriental.

programme.title: El camino del oeste
programme.desc: Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum y Richard Widmark protagonizan esta suntuosa historia de los hombres y mujeres que dejaron la comodidad y seguridad de sus vidas por la promesa de una tierra libre y una vida mejor en el indómito Oeste.

programme.title: El regreso de los siete magnificos
programme.desc: Protagonizada por Yul Brynner y con un reparto estelar que incluye a Robert Fuller, Warren Oates y Claude Akins, este western de aventuras sigue a los siete magníficos hasta México, donde se enfrentarán al duelo de sus vidas.

programme.title: Vuelven los siete magníficos
programme.desc: Un noble pistolero (George Kennedy) contrata a una brigada formada por los hombres más peligrosos del oeste para liberar a un líder revolucionario de los campesinos de una importante prisión mexicana en este clásico del oeste.

programme.title: El desafío de los siete magníficos
programme.desc: El jefe de 'Los Siete Magníficos' es ahora el sheriff de una pequeña ciudad. Cuando su 'tranquilidad' es destruida por el asesinato de su esposa, acepta una misión: rescatar a un grupo de mujeres de unos bandidos con la ayuda de cinco duros convictos.

programme.title: Siempre tuya
programme.desc: Ramón y Soledad, campesinos zacatecanos, emigran a la Ciudad de México en busca de una vida mejor. Pronto, Ramón triunfa como cantante, mientras Soledad sufre al ver cómo la fama lo transforma.

programme.title: Las Señoritas Vivanco
programme.desc: Dos hermanas solteronas creen que cometer un robo deja de ser considerado como pecado luego de ir a la confesión.

programme.title: El proceso de las señoritas Vivanco
programme.desc: Teresita insiste en acompañar a Hortensia en la cárcel. Ella se las ingeniará para que la metan presa. El director del penal pone a las Vivanco al abrigo de las burlas de las demás presas y de la dureza de los carceleros.

programme.title: Corrupción ferroviaria

programme.title: Tierra de policias

programme.title: El rostro oscuro de la ley

programme.title: El gángster

programme.title: Están todos bien
programme.desc: Cuando los hijos de Frank Goode (Robert DeNiro) cancelan una reunión familiar, el viudo emprende un viaje por el país para reconectarse con ellos. Esperando compartir las alegrías de sus vidas felices, sus visitas revelan una imagen no muy perfecta.

programme.title: Tan distinto como yo

programme.title: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: As Hajime's deadly duel with Noint continues, Aiko and Tio hatch a plan to assist Hajime; the other students also notice the alarming noise and gather together to figure out what's going on.

programme.title: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: With her trap sprung and all of the students rendered unable to fight, Eri unveils her true nature and sets the rest of her plan in motion.

programme.title: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: Hajime once again saves the day, thwarting Eri's evil plans and the demons' invasion; with the royal capital now safe, Hajime discusses future plans with his companions and classmates.

programme.title: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
programme.desc: Hajime, Yue, Shea, Tio, Kaori and Yue take a detour to learn more about each other, their outfits and Japanese otaku slang.

programme.title: After School Dice Club
programme.desc: On her way home from school, shy Miki encounters a classmate named Aya who insists on taking her around town to see the sights; when they come across Midori, their class rep, they follow her to a gaming store and discover a new way to have fun.

programme.title: After School Dice Club
programme.desc: The girls play an insect-themed bluffing game with an eccentric boy who is more preoccupied with gaining favor with his secret crush, Aya, than actually winning the game.

programme.title: Robotech
programme.desc: Capt. Gloval and Lisa fly to Alaska, where they find the United Earth Defense Government unexpectedly reluctant to avoid war with the Zentraedi; Rick and Minmei visit her parents in Japan and learn about a massive cover-up concerning the SDF-1.

programme.title: Robotech
programme.desc: The citizens of Macross City revolt after the Earth government prohibits them from leaving the SDF-1; Lynn Kyle, Minmei's cousin, stirs up trouble on the ship and causes Lisa grief over her dead fiancé; Rick suffers injury during a Zentraedi attack.

programme.title: Black Clover
programme.desc: A spatial magic spell catches the Magic Knights off-guard and teleports them hundreds of kilometers away from the capital, leaving only a few to defend the citizens from a mana-leeching witch.

programme.title: Black Clover
programme.desc: A savage spellcaster takes Fuegoleon out of action, leaving Asta, Noelle and the others to hold the capital; the townspeople get creative to thwart the witch terrorizing them.

programme.title: Venus Versus Virus
programme.desc: Lucia learns the truth of her past and vows to destroy her father.

programme.title: Wonder Egg Priority
programme.desc: A pair of mysterious voices lead 14-year-old Ai Ohto to a strange egg, promising her a chance at what she wants most.

programme.title: Wonder Egg Priority
programme.desc: Ai meets Neiru, another girl who is buying Eggs; she gets a cold shoulder at first, but that could change after the Eggs crack.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 2005, David Castor sufrió una muerte lenta y agonizante durante varios días. Su esposa Stacey sostuvo que fue un suicidio, a pesar de que se hizo con un anticongelante.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Se encuentra a una mujer muerta en el piso del cuarto de su apartamento.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Condena por Huella de Palma de Mano
programme.desc: Una investigación sobre un asesinato se ve favorecida por un requisito legal de que los bares tengan cámaras de video instaladas en las instalaciones. Video, cabello y sangre conducen al asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Después de ser admitido en el hospital con una hemorragia inexplicable, Chad Shelton de 11 meses llega a fallecer. Los investigadores y científicos buscan desesperadamente una causa cuando otros de la misma casa se enferman.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Dos hombres fueron asesinados mientras dormían en sus camas. La noche siguiente, un incendio provocó la destrucción de una clínica de planificación familiar.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Una mujer quien se ha conocido por sufrir de depresión aparentemente se quitó su propia vida.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un oficial de policía de Alaska encontró el cuerpo de una mujer mientras patrullaba de rutina un parque público.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Trampa para turistas
programme.desc: En 1993, el estado de Florida era conocido por algo más que Disney World. La atención mundial se centró en una serie de robos dirigidos a turistas.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1996, cuando un grupo fundamentalista comienza a robar bancos cerca de Spokane, las autoridades saben de inmediato que están tratando con criminales con experiencia.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Los doctores del hospital no pudieron determinar la causa de las alucinaciones y el intenso dolor de Bobby Curley. Lo trataron como un trastorno neurológico pero su estado se deterioró. Él estaba siendo envenenado.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Poco después del amanecer, se inicia un incendio en un contenedor de basura en Vancouver. Nadie ve al pirómano ni el fuego, que arde durante horas en el estacionamiento desolado. Pero hay más que basura en este contenedor en llamas.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando encuentran muerta a la esposa de un dentista bien conocido, la policía se esfuerza por identificar a un sospechoso. Algunas fibras y un estudio de los patrones climáticos en la noche del asesinato abren el caso y revelan al asesino.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1985, Julie Estes fue secuestrada de una tienda de conveniencia en Southside donde trabajaba. Su cuerpo fue encontrado al día siguiente, pero el asesinato quedó sin resolver hasta el 2003.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando un rico magnate inmobiliario desapareció, pareció ser un juego sucio. En su testamento, dejó instrucciones sobre lo que sucedería si moría en circunstancias violentas.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Una Bolsa de Evidencia
programme.desc: Se investiga el asesinato de Jessica Knott, de 9 años. Los investigadores usan una bolsa de basura para conectar al sospechoso James Edward Crow, Jr. con el crimen.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Bloqueo del escritor
programme.desc: Una brillante joven arquitecta se enfermó y murió poco antes de testificar en un juicio penal. La autopsia reveló que había sido envenenada con arsénico.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Manchas delatoras
programme.desc: La policía instituyó una búsqueda intensa cuando la madre de dos niños pequeños desapareció.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1989, April Loveless, de 4 años, fue encontrada muerta en el patio trasero de su casa en Texas. Sus padres le dijeron a la policía que fue atacada y asesinada por perros salvajes. Los investigadores no estuvieron de acuerdo.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Sin oraciones
programme.desc: La fundadora de American Atheists desapareció en 1995 junto con uno de sus hijos y su nieta, junto con 500,000 dólares en monedas de oro. La policía se centró en varios sospechosos, incluyendo a David R. Waters, que trabajaba para los Ateos Americanos.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un guardia de seguridad desapareció de su puesto sin dejar rastro. Sus restos fueron encontrados un año después en un campamento lejano.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1991, Pearl Smith, residente de Maine, desaparece después de una discusión con su esposo, Bill Bruns. Los investigadores encuentran un rastro de sangre que conduce al sótano de la pareja.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Un hombre rico y su esposa fueron atacados por tres hombres enmascarados fuera de su lujosa casa en Louisiana. A él le dispararon hasta causarle la muerte y a ella la obligaron a abrir la caja fuerte que tenían escondida.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En 1991, el pornógrafo de San Francisco Artie Mitchell fue asesinado en su casa. Su hermano y socio comercial, que fue encontrado cerca del lugar con un rifle, luego confiesa haber disparado a Artie, pero la pregunta es si el disparo fue premeditado.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Una modelo aspirante apareció muerta y el sospechoso principal fue su novio. Cuando finalmente se le dio el visto bueno, los investigadores tuvieron que buscar más profundamente para poder encontrar al responsable.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: Cuando un joven bombero murió de lo que parecía ser una enfermedad cardíaca grave pero no diagnosticada, su familia y amigos quedaron devastados, pero no tenían pruebas de algún juego sucio.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos: Una pastilla amarga para tragar
programme.desc: Se cuenta la historia de la bombero Michelle Baker. Después de conocer al Dr. Maynard Muntzing, quedó embarazada de él. Después de esta noticia, ella se enfermaba siempre que estaban juntos.

programme.title: Crímenes imperfectos
programme.desc: En el 2007, Brian y Beverly Mauck fueron encontrados muertos en su casa en Graham Washington. Usando una huella de la palma de una mano y de un zapato en la escena del crimen, los investigadores enfocan su atención en Daniel Tavares, quien había tatuado la espalda de Brian.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jimmy finally gets the news he’s been waiting for – he’s been accepted into NYU! But he’s got other things on his mind. He is slowly discovering that he has other options when it comes to his real dream – walking again.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: It’s Anya’s first year running the Free The Children Freedom Fast to promote education and health in Africa. She has a lot to coordinate - which would be hard enough without meddling Holly J, who’s determined to make Anya choose between her and Sav.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Mia’s renewed relationship with Lucas is making her feel like she’s on top of the world. With the extra free time afforded by his help, she's taking on all the high school things her parenting has kept her from enjoying.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Marco’s world is rocked when Paige drops a bomb – her dad’s going to help her buy a condo. Ellie’s just learned she might be up for the editorship of the Core newspaper, so she’s distracted.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Spinner and Jimmy have just one more exam before they’re finally done school and, with Jimmy's help, Spinner's sure he can pass and enjoy his cancer-free future.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: With time ticking towards the Class of ’07 Prom and Graduation ceremony, Liberty has the perfect night planned: a hotel prom, with the amazing Natasha Bedingfield performing.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Relieved of parental duty for the year by mom, Mia starts the school year off with a bang by bonding with new girl, Leia, and getting scouted to be the new face of football star Tom Blakes’ shoe line.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Mia does what she can to ensure her success. Besides, Tom is handsome and famous, so Mia thinks being with Tom to get ahead isn’t such a bad trade.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jane wants to play football but since there is no girls team, then boys’ football it is. The Shep doesn’t like the idea one bit, but once Jane proves she’s faster, stronger, and more athletic than most of the team, he relents…

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Eager to make the most of her college experience, Liberty jumps at the chance to rush the most popular sorority at Smithdale. Determined to get in, Liberty slowly exchanges old habits and old friends (Manny and Emma) for sorority approved ones.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Peter begins a relationship with Mia and a friendship with Riley. Finding a balance between a new girlfriend and a new guy friend gets confusing, especially when Riley is suddenly kissing Peter.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Sav and Anya plan to celebrate their six-month anniversary on the school’s overnight trip. Only problem? Alli, Sav’s sister, convinces their parents to let her go on the trip on the condition that Sav spends every second with her.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Mia’s T-Bombz campaign is hitting the city and Degrassi. But Holly J has bigger and better things going on. She’s prepping the Power Squad for an out-of-town competition, and things are looking good.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Spinner and Jane have plans for next year – she’ll start pre-law and he’ll attend Police College. When he doesn’t get in, he can’t bear to tell her, so he lies.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Desperate to win Jane back, Spinner sneaks into the Leadership Convention Jane is speaking at and proposes. When Jane turns him down, Spinner breaks up with her – nothing he does is ever good enough.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Riley’s the star of Degrassi’s first-ever football game win! The Shep is floored at how much Riley’s improved.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Clare stands up for Connor when he receives unfair treatment from The Shep. The result of their peaceful protest? Detentions for everyone. No one is more frustrated by the detention than Alli. It wasn’t her idea to protest.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Pushed to the edge by Holly J, Alli begins posting nasty things about her on the “anti-Grapevine” blog, the underground school on-line site.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Shep has returned after his sensitivity training and it’s Spirit Week at Degrassi! However spirits are anything but high at home for Jane as she struggles to get her dropout brother Lucas off the couch.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Jane admits to herself that her issues with her dad go deeper than the divorce – she thinks maybe he did things to her. Jane is very confused and feels alone. Lucas gives Jane a hard time for creating tension between mom and dad.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Emma’s tired of being referred to as Kelly’s girlfriend and Blonde Emma – she’s not even blonde anymore! Determined to create a distinct university identity, Emma borrows some pot that was gifted to Kelly and smokes up with Becca and Gwyneth.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.desc: Cesar helps Casey Anderson, of "Expedition Wild," and his wife, actress Missi Pyle, with their dogs; a pit bull's fears make him aggressive.

programme.desc: Cesar joins forces with Jennifer McCarthy to examine the nature of wolf-dogs, the result of the cross-breeding of wolves and domestic dogs.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When an offender, with a long record, ducks his day in court, Bobby Brown knows whom to call--The Dog!? And knowing that few souls can resist Beth's clever persuasion, Dog gives her the job of luring the fugitive in.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today's case is a twofer, a brother and sister both charged with drug related offenses. Also, Dog has crossed paths with the brother before. He once tried to stop Dog from arresting one of the most violent fugitives of his career.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When a brother bondsman from Washington State calls Dog for help tracking a runner in search of fun in the sun on the tropical paradise of Kauai, the team gets on the case. Dog's only problem? No leads!

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and team help out a bondsman friend whose client jumped bail, but the target is a blank slate. Are his tattoos gang related? Is he likely to be violent? And making matters worse, when they hit his apartment, they learn he is moving out.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: They say you can't teach an old dog new tricks, but what if it's The Dog doing the teaching? Today's target is wanted on domestic abuse charges, but when Dog discovers she works for an escort service, he opts for a new twist on an old ruse.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Things get stressful when Dog and the team race to Honolulu International to catch a felon who's booked on an afternoon flight to Florida owing $140,000 to a bondsman.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: After Dog's son-in-law, Travis, signs off on an iffy bond and the accused turns into a fugitive, Dog and Beth decide to bring Travis on his first bounty. What better way to teach him than to show him just how hard it can be to bring in your man!

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog knows that it is better to give than to receive, so when a fellow bondsman grieving for his recently departed spouse requests his help, he jumps into action. While studying the fugitive's file, the team uncovers a surprising fact.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: No one becomes a bondsman overnight and even the members of Dog's team know there is always more to learn. So when Duane Lee cuts a felon a little too much slack about checking-in and then goes missing, Duane Lee knows he's gonna get schooled.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: What starts out as a perfect day for Dog turns ugly fast. He and Beth are enjoying helping their kids learn how to care for their new pets, when duty calls for a tough case. The charges: alleged cruelty to animals.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: In between tracking down a potentially dangerous ex-con facing a five-year stretch in the big house, Leland is struggling to find time to train and compete for his first boxing match in years.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and family head to Kona to track down a wanted father who's looking to bolt to the mainland to evade sentencing. Meanwhile, Dog does some evading of his own - Avoiding the much dreaded birthday party!

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the team need to help Leland hunt down some elusive fugitives The case is a family affair with both mother and daughter in trouble with the law.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog knows that crime and drugs not only damage victims but also harm the families of the perpetrators, especially the kids. And both of the fugitives he's chasing today have left shattered families and struggling women in their wake.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Jim is a bondsman and longtime friend of Dog. Jim's son has just started in the family business. Today Jim has asked Dog to track down a potentially dangerous fugitive, and take his son along for some training with the best in the world.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his posse head to Colorado for a special mission, to catch Marco, an alleged drug dealer. It's been ten months since Marco went on the lam, and his bondsman stands to lose his family business if Marco is not caught.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The trail is hot and the stakes is high for Dog and the posse. The "Big Fish" in this case is Marco, an alleged drug dealer with a big bond. But a major key to catching him is Elizabeth, who is also a fugitive from the law.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is still on the search for the elusive fugitive, Marco. Dog has been tracking him across Colorado, from Grand Junction to Denver, and now a hot tip that a long time associate of his is hiding in Pueblo sends the team racing south.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and the posse travel to the Big Island to help Leland track down a small-time Bonnie and Clyde couple. Their crime: theft, including allegedly stealing a pair of Buddha statues for resale.

programme.title: Dog the Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: This fugitive is hard to pin down in Honolulu's downtown district, moving from hostel to hotel to apartment high-rise. But as the hunt evolves, Dog discovers that this alleged burglar isn't the only family member wanted by the law.

programme.title: Cyborg
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: Kickboxer
programme.desc: When kickboxing champ Eric Sloane is crippled in the ring by the evil Tong Po, Eric's younger brother, Kurt, seeks vengeance.

programme.title: Lionheart
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme is Lyon Gaultier, a deserter in the French Foreign Legion who travels to the USA and enters the gory world of bare-knuckled street fighting in order to make money to save his brother's life and family.

programme.title: Double Impact
programme.desc: Identical twins are separated at six months and raised on different continents. They reunite twenty-five years later to avenge the murder of their parents and reclaim their stolen family fortune.

programme.title: Timecop
programme.desc: Max Walker, an officer for a security agency that regulates time travel, must fend for his life against a shady politician who's intent on changing the past to control the future.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1962, the small town residents of Hanford, California lost their sense of peace when one of their own, 15-year-old Marlene Miller, was murdered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mother of two vanishes after a shopping trip. Her body is discovered a month later, and witnesses say they saw the victim being forced into a car by an unknown person.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is shot to death in her store just one day before she is to testify against the man accused of robbing her. The robber becomes the prime suspect, but he has a solid alibi: a timestamped videotape of his activities on the day of the murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1993, the state of Florida was known for more than just Disney World. Worldwide attention focused on a rash of robberies which targeted tourists. Some vacationers were killed in these attacks, but some fought and survived.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators find a shoe print, several foreign hairs and unknown fingerprints at a murder scene. But they believe the most telling piece of evidence is the bite mark on the victim's chest.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman's death in Pennsylvania triggers a homicide investigation into another woman's death in North Carolina. Faced with striking similarities, examiners must determine if their suspect's story about accidental drowning is all wet.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 34-year-old nurse experiences a variety of flu-like symptoms. None of her doctors are able to discover the cause, until she visits her gynecologist for a routine check-up.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Time of death becomes pivotal after a pregnant woman is found murdered in her air-conditioned bedroom. A striking similarity between her death and an HBO movie gives examiners the clues they need to thaw out the alibi of a cold-blooded killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files: A Wrong Foot
programme.desc: Police were puzzled by an obscure print found at a crime scene where one man had been killed and two teenage girls were seriously injured. Neither of the girls could identify their attacker, but one simple clue helped track the footsteps of a killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files: Order Up
programme.desc: A man is found dead in his home and his ex-wife has a perfect alibi. To determine time of death, investigators need to know when the victim ate his last meal. An endocrinologist, a forensic botanist and a short-order cook answer their question.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Soon after organizing a workers' strike, a union official is executed in his home. Neither his wife nor anyone in the neighborhood hear any gunshots. It takes a forensic sound test, an electron microscope and a nightgown to explain why.

programme.title: Forensic Files: A Welcome Intrusion
programme.desc: A man tells police he shot an intruder who had attacked and murdered his wife. The husband paints a tragic picture and is dubbed a hero. Four years later, forensic evidence leads police to re-examine the motives of this so-called hero.

programme.title: Forensic Files: Within Arm's Reach
programme.desc: A police officer accused of killing his estranged wife insists she committed suicide. Investigators say it was murder — that it was physically impossible for the woman to have shot herself.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Firefighters find an entire family dead inside their home in an apparent murder-suicide, but there are several inconsistent clues in the rubble. Could ballistics, a time card and some secret audiotapes unravel the mystery?

programme.title: Forensic Files: Brotherhoods
programme.desc: Two men are murdered while sleeping in their beds. The next night, arson destroys a family planning clinic. Investigators wonder whether some shards of glass, paint chips and a chicken feather could link what appear to be two separate crimes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators are baffled after finding a murder scene devoid of any physical evidence, but they suspect that the victim's dog had witnessed the crime. If so, forensic scientists would have to find some way to learn what the dog had seen.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young TV news producer is raped and murdered in her apartment. Police identify two suspects, but both are cleared of any wrongdoing. When the case stalls for more than a year, investigators turn to the Commonwealth of Virginia's DNA Databank.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Police are dispatched to the scene of a shooting and discover the victim's husband is one of their own: a homicide detective who says his wife accidentally shot herself in the head.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: For years, a woman suffered from what appeared to be the unpleasant side effects of lithium, a drug prescribed to treat bipolar disorder. When she died, investigators had to determine if her death was due to natural causes, suicide or murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman is found dead in a ravine, and crucial evidence has been washed away by severe thunderstorms. Twice, the trail turns cold. Almost 20 years later, an old hat and a chip of stainless steel brings the killer to justice.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When an 11-year-old girl disappears from a remote Alaska town, investigators wonder if she has been attacked by a bear or become lost in the dense woods. Eventually, they realize that neither assumption is true.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Just weeks before a witness is to testify against the man accused of sexually assaulting her, she is murdered in the front yard of her own home. Investigators immediately suspect her attacker, but they don't have enough evidence to prove his guilt.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: For six years, a serial killer prowled the streets of New York City. He wrote letters to police and The New York Post, indicating he would kill twelve people — one for each astrological sign.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A healthy young man dies mysteriously in his sleep and toxicology tests reveal a lethal dose of lidocaine in his blood. Investigators find a suicide note and presume he killed himself until a forensic linguist examines the note.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In the summer of 1986, Kathleen Lipscomb's body was found on a deserted road outside of San Antonio. Months and years passed, but the crime was never solved. Finally, a private investigator discovered Kathleen's diary.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A retired police officer is found dead with a single gunshot wound to the head. His wife says the motive was robbery, but later tells police he committed suicide.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A suspicious fire sweeps through an apartment, killing two young women. The cause of the fire and the identity of the victims are unclear, but a closer look at the scene reveals something hidden in the ashes.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: Max tries to regain the respect of his former bowling mentor in order to help him defeat a peculiar new Org.

programme.desc: Danny competes with a wealthy rival for Kendall while preventing the Wedding Dress Org from capturing Turtle Cove's brides to be.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: Alyssa must rely on her martial arts heritage when the Rangers come up against Samurai Org.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: Nayzor returns more powerful than ever requiring the Rangers to quest across time and space to find a new Zord's help.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: The Power Ranges Time Force travel back in time to help the Power Rangers Wild Force, to prevent the three Mut-Orgs from joining forces with Master Org.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: Cole learns the truth about his parents when Master Org reveals his sinister origin to the Wild Force Rangers.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: Merrick must confront a demon from his past when Zen-Aku returns to claim his soul.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: Cole must protect Kite, a young boy alone in the city, as Mandilok, the new Org General, discovers a taste for new buildings.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: Princess Shayla and Merrick argue as the Flute Org's music ruins their song, causing the Rangers to dance uncontrollably.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: While Max and Taylor help Kite look for his home, they are attacked by Jindrax and his brother Juggelo at an amusement park.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: The Lion Tamer Org takes control of the Wild Zords and turns them against the Rangers.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: Kite finally remembers his past as he grows dissatisfied with mankind's disregard for nature.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: Without Princess Shayla or the Wild Zords, the Rangers still refuse to give up in their fight to save the world.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: Ten Red Rangers from ten different teams unite to stop the Machine Empire from using Serpenterra to destroy Earth.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: The Duke Org Onikage arrives in the Nexus with a plan to infiltrate the Rangers' Animarium and capture Princess Shayla.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: The Power Rangers fight across dimensions to try and rescue Princess Shayla from the returning Master Org.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: The Rangers receive help from an unlikely source in their battle against the powerful Locomotive Org, as Jindrax plots to bring back his friend.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force
programme.desc: Jindrax and Toxica team up with the Rangers in order to rescue the Princess and destroy the Nexus once and for all.

programme.title: Power Rangers: Wild Force

programme.desc: Nya, as Samurai X, helps the Ninja escape, but NINJAGO's toughest marshal, Hounddog McBrag, is hot on their trail.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: A hopeful singer headed to NINJAGO City helps Kai, Zane and Dareth evade Hounddog McBrag, and Zane learns the value of emotions.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: The Ninja regroup at Twitchy's gas station and escape Hounddog McBrag's capture with a plan to infiltrate the Council of the Crystal King.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: Lloyd travels in disguise to a hidden temple where he joins the Council of the Crystal King and learns Kabuki Mask's true identity.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: Harumi tells Lloyd how she survived and became the herald of the Crystal King. Lloyd learns her plan for NINJAGO but is powerless to stop her.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: The Ninja search for Lloyd and walk right into Harumi's trap as Lloyd falls victim to her manipulation.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: The Ninja search for escape while Master Wu and the others defend the Weapons of Spinjitzu from the Council of the Crystal King.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: Nya, as Samurai X, rescues the Ninja, but Harumi's plan for the Weapons of Spinjitzu is already in motion.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: Lloyd escapes from the Crystal Temple with the help of an unlikely ally, as both the Crystal King and the Ninja prepare for battle.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: The Ninja retrieve the Destiny's Bounty and race to rescue Lloyd as he evades capture in the jungle below the Crystal Temple.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: The Ninja fight back against the Crystal King's army as Lloyd and Master Wu trace a clue back to an unlikely ally.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: Lloyd and Master Wu listen to Garmadon's recent journey of self-improvement and find the clue they need in the fight against the Crystal King.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: Garmadon trains Lloyd to use the Oni Form, but the Ninja resort to another strategy as the Crystal King's forces reach NINJAGO City.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: The Ninja launch an assault through NINJAGO City in their upgraded vehicles, but the Crystal King unleashes a new source of power to stop them.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: Master Wu takes shelter with an unlikely resistance while Nya and Jay escape the wreckage of the Destiny's Bounty with a plan to find help.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: Pixal takes the broken Zane to Borg Tower for repairs with the help of unlikely allies, and Lloyd shows an old adversary what it means to be a hero.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: Kai and Cole avoid capture and bring new hope to the resistance, while Lloyd and Garmadon search for the missing Serpentine.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: The Ninja reach out to allies across NINJAGO, while at Borg Tower Pixal prepares for the coming battle

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: Racer Seven escorts Cole across NINJAGO City to send for help, and Lloyd gives Garmadon a chance to prove he has changed.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Crystalized
programme.desc: The Ninja prepare to make their last stand as the crystal army closes in, while Lloyd and Garmadon take the fight to the Crystal King

programme.title: Ninjago Legends: Monstrosity
programme.desc: Kai, the Ninja of Fire, is lost in a Land of Monsters, where he must face a series of vicious and bizarre creatures, if he has any hope of getting home.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: The Blood Moon
programme.desc: While protecting Ninjago City from daily threats, the Ninja encounters a new elemental master in league with an old enemy.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: Shattered Dreams
programme.desc: Ras attacks the Cloud Kingdom to obtain information on the Forbidden Five; Euphrasia informs the ninja and they set off to save the kingdom.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: Beyond the Phantasm Cave
programme.desc: Cinder and Jordana compete for Lord Ras's favour; the ninja set out to find a teacher who can defeat the Wolf Clan; Wyldfyre sneaks on the Destiny's Bounty.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: Force From the East
programme.desc: The ninjas find two old dragon masters who agree to train them. Meanwhile, Ras invades the Land of Lost Things.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: The Spell at the Waterfall
programme.desc: Egalt teaches the Rising Dragon to the ninja; Sora and Riyu learn Spinjitzu from Rontu; Cole reaches the Monastery with the Finders and sets off on an adventure with Zane.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: To Mysterium
programme.desc: Cole, Zane and Bonzle travel to Mysterium, only to fall into Dorama's trap; Arin is frustrated with his Spinjitzu training.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: Fugitives From Madness
programme.desc: Zane, Bonzle and Cole meet their creator Gandalaria. Kai is appointed the third Dragon Master. The dragon masters turn into stone sculptures as the blood moon appears in the sky. The other ninja's training ends prematurely.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: Secrets of the Wyldness
programme.desc: When Rontu and Egalt turn to stone, Lloyd's visions lead the ninja to Wyldness. There, the ninja seek shelter in the sorceress's warehouse. Cole and Zane fight against the administration and allow Bonzle, Sprite and Gandalaria to escape.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: The Forest of Spirits
programme.desc: Cole, Zane and Gandalaria search for a release spell and obtain magical powers. The ninjas rush to the Ritual of the Blood Moon to stop Lord Ras. Kai and Sora disguise themselves as Wolf Mask Warriors.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: Rising Ninja
programme.desc: The blood moon ritual begins. Ras has everything he needs to free the Forbidden Five. The ninja confronts him and tries to disrupt the ritual; Kai and Bonzle are trapped in the portal, but Lloyd and Arin are there to help.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: The Shape of Motion
programme.desc: While searching for his parents, Arin and the Ninja rescue a baby dragon, uncovering a new mystery and mission for the team.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: Enter the City of Temples
programme.desc: When the Ninja are not invited to the Tournament of Sources, they break into the City of Temples to earn their entry.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: They Gather for the Feast
programme.desc: After earning invitations to the Tournament of Sources, the Ninja attend a banquet for Elemental Masters with friendly faces and old enemies, and Lloyd confronts a familiar face from his vision.

programme.title: LEGO Ninjago Dragons Rising: Inside the Maze
programme.desc: Arin continues his investigation into the missing Horns but makes time for Frak, who Sora suspects is working for Ras and Nya's first match pits her against Jay, still with no memory of their past.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar les restringe el dinero al Abuelo y al Noruego ocasionando que el Noruego tenga que consumir un licor hecho en casa por Peluzín lo que lo deja ciego.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego lleva a Jonathan al museo de antropología por encargo de su escuela y se da cuenta que un personaje del Calendario Azteca se parece mucho a él.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La Familia del Barrio se va de vacaciones a Acapulco, invitados por Gaspar. Después de una gran borrachera en el Baby'O, el abuelo amanece en la casa de Acapulco Shore.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Accidentalmente, el Abuelo descubre las habilidades boxísticas de Peluzín y se dedica a explotarlas. Mientras, el Noruego se embarca en la búsqueda de un nuevo hobbie.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Camino a rentar una película, el Noruego adquiere una nueva mascota. En tanto, Peluzín tiene que mudarse de su departamento por falta de pago.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego se topa con un niño de la calle con quien supuestamente mantiene un parentesco mientras que Peluzín organiza un negocio piramidal para aprovecharse de todos los del edificio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Un incidente hace que Irma revalore su vida y desaparezca. Mientras el Abuelo y el Noruego tratan de encontrarla, Gaspar y Jonathan tratan de encontrarle su lugar a Olaf en la familia.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Independientemente de resultado de las elecciones norteamericanas, Donald Trump decide declarale la guerra a México y LFDB se embarca en una misión especial para derrocar al tirano Trump.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Pitipú recibe una visita de su pasado el cual lleva muchos años tratando de dejar atrás, mientras que el Noruego se embarca en una búsqueda para conseguirle una madre a Olaf.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: En una parodia de La Rosa de Guadalupe, el Abuelo es encarado por su familia para tratarse su adicción al sexo, mientras que Peluzín se aprovecha de Olaf para establecer un negocio ilícito en la escuela.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Una hilarante parodia de A Christmas Carol, en la que al Abuelo se le aparecen fantasmas del pasado presente y futuro. Olaf es Timmy y Peluzin el fantasma.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar cansado de la ineficiencia y corrupción decide postularse como servidor público, mientras que Irma es grabada en una situación incómoda, convirtiéndose en una celebridad.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Pelúzín se roba un paquete de la puerta de Don Sebas, volteando a todo el edificio de cabeza, mientras Jonathan, cansado del bullying del Abuelo decide darle una lección.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: LFDB decide hacerle una intervención al Abuelo porque está mas hostil que nunca y quieren que busque tratamiento médico, mientras que Peluzín y Jonathan ayudan a Pitipú a conseguir su nacionalidad.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Despúes de una ardua búsqueda el Noruego encuentra a su padre, mientras que Jonathan ayuda a Peluzín a llevar una vida de bien.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego decide recuperar a su antigua mascota tlacuache llamada Chofri, mientras que el Abuelo atraviesa por un lapso de demencia senil y depende de Gaspar salvarlo.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Un extraño bebé aparece en la puerta de LFDB, quien viene acarreando una ola de destrucción. Ahora la salvación del mundo depende de la Familia del Barrio.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo consigue una ocupación donde se siente como pez en el agua, mientras que Peluzín entra en un proyecto experimental que le traerá muchos problemas a todos.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar encuentra por fin el amor de manera inesperada mientras que el Pasita, triste por las limitaciones de su edad avanzada consigue la receta para la eterna juventud.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Frustrado por su trabajo, Gaspar busca apoyo en el Abuelo y el Noruego y termina accidentado. Mientras, gracias a la medicina experimental, Peluzín se convierte en el Dr Lambretón.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Pelu el Payaso le pide a Jony que sea su nuevo ayudante e inician una gira espectacular que da muchos frutos. Mientras tanto, el Noruego descubre su afición por los tatuajes.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Peluzín adquiere una nueva mascota que revolucionará el vecindario. En tanto el Noruego y Gaspar intentan ayudar a el Lentejas a superar sus extrañas inclinaciones sexuales.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo y el Noruego buscan nuevos horizontes a través de la creación de una fundación, mientras Peluzín cae en la cuenta de su soledad y sale a buscar amigos.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego aprende inglés y se prepara para vivir el sueño americano. En tanto, el Abuelo llega a un reencuentro con sus ex-compañeros de colegio y descubre una verdad sepultada por el tiempo.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Peluzín tiene éxito con un nuevo método de protesta, mientras El Noruego y Jony dan sus primeros pasos en la "cossa nostra"

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La Familia abre un grupo de WhatsApp para estar más conectados pero este se sale de control, mientras que Peluzín aprrovecha una noticia de un asesinato para sacarle dinero a Pitipú.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El calentamiento global trae consigo una mueva amenaza para la ciudad, mientras que Irma y Peluzín emprenden en un nuevo negocio, reclutando a varios amigos.

programme.desc: The death of a former cover girl leads detectives to unearth secrets the woman was desperately trying to hide.

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: An accident that kills three people hits close to home for Curtis and brings back painful memories for McCoy.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A forensic specialist is targeted by killers, challenging Briscoe and Curtis to find a suspect; McCoy and Ross turn up evidence on the victim.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Detectives search for the killer of a physician who had a dangerous sex life; an attorney maintains murders are a result of too much television.

programme.title: Law & Order

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Join the musical journey of Little Angel's delightful adventures as they explore the playground and learn valuable lessons about sharing and friendship.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Get ready for a harmonious journey with the Little Angel as they dive into the world of emotions. With a catchy melody and a sprinkle of magic, they turn tears into smiles.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Join the Little Angel as they embark on adventures filled with giggles and life lessons. They learn about healthy choices and the joy of helping out.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Little Angel invites you to join their fun-filled nursery rhyme adventures. Get ready to sing, dance, and laugh along as they bring classic nursery rhymes to life in the most playful way.

programme.title: Little Angel
programme.desc: Enjoy your day at the zoo with Little Angel, where they explore the zoo and learn about various animals and their habits.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: ¡Únete a Little Angel para un día de diversión! Desde cantar con globos hasta imitar sonidos de animales, canciones infantiles, partes del cuerpo, citas con el abuelo, sueños de dinosaurios y confiar en el médico, ¡es un día de risas y aprendizaje!

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a Little Angel en las encantadoras melodías que inspiran dulces sueños y sonrisas.

programme.title: Little Angel (LAS)
programme.desc: Únete a los Little Angels en sus tiernos viajes. Desde el amor entre hermanos hasta la perseverancia, pasando por la alegría de los cumpleaños, la diversión en el salón y la salud, ¡todo un tesoro de lecciones envueltas en amor y risas!

programme.desc: Súbete a bordo de un viaje lleno de diversión y risas mientras Little Angel se adentra en una aventura.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: The Hemingway Papers
programme.desc: The legendary last manuscript of the great Ernest Hemingway tells of a buried treasure on an island far away… and thief extraordinaire Lupin is on the trail! But he gets caught up in a local civil war, Lupin will have to keep his wits or risk his life!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Napoleon's Dictionary
programme.desc: Lupin learns of his grandfather's secret treasure, supposedly hidden in the pages of a dictionary previously owned by Napoleon Bonaparte! Said dictionary just happens to be the prize in a cross-country classic car race.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: From Siberia With Love
programme.desc: Ultimate thief Lupin III has a new target: the lost gold of the Romanov dynasty! With the help of a mysterious blonde named Judy Scott, Lupin discovers the treasure hidden in Texas, at the Bank of Liberty.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: It's been a long time since Jigen, Goemon and Fujiko have heard from Lupin. Then one day, they each receive an invitation from Lupin for a reunion aboard the luxury liner Sirloin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An international soccer game is taking place in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil and Lupin has his eyes on the box office and betting takes. Will the box office heist go as planned?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: An old man who supposedly knows the secret to Hitler's legacy lives in East Germany within the Berlin Wall. Lupin and his gang track the old man down, but the old man can't recall anything about any legacy.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: At Loch Ness in Scotland, the mysterious monster Nessie reveals itself from the lake, charmed by Fujiko's singing. Seeing this, Doctor Oz decides to use Fujiko to capture Nessie for his personal gain.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Fujiko and a mystery man have an enticing job for Lupin: Stealing a ton of gold bullion from a Swiss Bank, a bank renowned for its tight security. Can it be done? What is the mystery man's true identity?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A man is threatening to destroy the Leaning Tower of Pisa with a device that generates artificial earthquakes. The Italian government has no choice but to meet the culprit's, but Lupin takes the ransom for himself!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has stolen the golden death mask of Tutankhamen, the ancient Egyptian pharaoh known as the "boy king." However, when Lupin tries on the golden death mask he becomes possessed by an ominous curse.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Trans Europe Superexpress train has departed Venice and is headed to France. Onboard the Superexpress is crime boss Don Marcino's ill-gotten treasures. Can Lupin and his gang pull off the heist before the train reaches its destination?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin meets the grandson of master Ukiyoe artist, Toushusai Sharaku and learns that he has been switching his own works with his grandfather's originals. Unable to switch the last painting due to illness, he asks Lupin to switch it in his stead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko have been invited to a party hosted by Marcel Dulane, a member of Paris' high society. However, the elegant party turns out to be a trap. Fujiko is taken hostage and Lupin, with a time-bomb belt strapped to his waist…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is in Monaco to race his new toy in the Monaco Grand Prix. Or so he thought. Lupin ends up losing both his money and race car in a fixed poker game at the casino.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A rare bottle of Bordeaux, commissioned by Napoleon for his beloved wife, Josephine, is to be given to the President of the United States as a Christmas present.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A criminal gang has hidden a microfilm containing the manufacturing process for artificial diamonds, developed by NASA, in one of Inspector Zenigata's molars. Determined to get his hands on that microfilm, Lupin must capture Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Forward Hees, the world's richest man, suddenly dies a mysterious death and leaves a large ruby to Fujiko in his will. After inheriting the ruby, Fujiko comes down with the same mysterious fever as Hees…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A Count challenges Lupin to steal a gemstone named Dracula's Tear from on board his airship, the Hendenburg. However, also on board the ship are several formidable detectives: Homes III, Detective Archer, Koojisuke Kaneda and Inspector Zenigata.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is suffering from Transformation Sickness, an illness that transforms him into a cruel, cold-blooded criminal at the stroke of midnight, and leaves him with no recollection of his murderous crime spree in the morning…

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: A small Arab nation has received a blackmail notice. Pay a $100 million or have their oil fields blown up. Lupin targets the money, but his plans are hindered when he finds out the culprits are using human bombs.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro and Drake continue to chase Apoo to get the antibody against Ice Oni, while Chopper is trying to figure out how to fight the virus.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: While Kaido begins the New Onigashima Project, Marco appears in front of Chopper and the others, who are struggling with Ice Oni. The members of the Tobi Roppo continue to give the Straw Hats a hard time while their former member helps Zoro.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu that he once confronted a man, who came to Onigashima looking to get Kaido's head. His name was Ace. The two of them engaged in a fierce battle that eventually turned into an important friendship.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The formidable Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates stand in Zoro's way as he tries to get to the rooftop. Marco sees his late comrade in Zoro's determination and tries to pave the way for him.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu about how Ace gave him hope for the future. Meanwhile, Luffy and the other allied pirates from the Worst Generation make it to the rooftop to finally face off against Kaido and Big Mom.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy's strong attack reminds Kaido of all the strong ones he's ever met. On the other hand, Luffy, Law, and Kid keep quarreling amongst themselves. Meanwhile, Sanji is caught and interrogated by Black Maria in what he calls "heaven."

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro, and Killer keep landing hard blows against Kaido in tandem despite the arguing. However, when Big Mom steps in and unleashes powerful lightning strikes, the tide turns for all except one of the rookies.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy pummels Kaido with his well-trained Kong Gatling and delivers a final blow using all his strength. Big Mom tries to fight back, but Law gets in her way and Kid and Killer also try to finish Kaido off.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: After watching the Straw Hats' departure to Onigashima, Tama wondered if there was anything she could do to help the Straw Hats and the samurai. Now that she's here on Onigashima, it's time to execute her powerful plan – Operation Kibi Dango!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Sanji is captured and tortured by the merciless Black Maria. She names the terms of his release: to turn over one of his crewmates. He hesitates but has no other option. After much distress, he makes a move that surprises everyone.

programme.desc: Seeing everyone turning into Ice Oni, there is nothing that the samurai warriors can do other than grieve. However, it wasn't just them who were devastated by Queen's raging virus. When their desperation and frustration peak, they hear a hopeful voice.

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.title: One Piece

programme.desc: Luffy remembers how he was advised by his friends, how he was saved by his comrades, and the frustrations of being defeated. As Kaido mocks him to his face, the Color of the Supreme King Haki gushes out and they clash again.

programme.title: RiffTrax Short: A Visit to Santa

programme.title: Sala de emergencias: Historias inéditas

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Norma decide bautizar al bebé y le dice a Juan que se llamará Juan David, después del bautizo él le presenta su hijo a todos los empleados. Gabriela interroga a Fernando sobre Dínora.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Martín le aconseja a Norma que se case con Juan, quien sueña vivir con ella y el niño como una familia. Rosario se le atraviesa con el carro a Franco y él la rechaza, Gabriela pacta con Dínora.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Sara arriesga su vida para salvar a Franco de los matones, él le agradece con un beso. Jimena llega a la casa tras burlarse de Óscar y se preocupa por su hermana, a ambas les espera un regaño.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes
programme.desc: Norma acude a su cita con Juan, pero se va al ver que no está solo, Óscar enfrenta a Jimena delante de Gabriela, quien se indigna al saber lo sucedido. Franco busca desquitarse de los matones.

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: Pasión de gavilanes

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes a veritable gazelle when he takes dancing lessons at Gomez and Morticia's suggestion after he admits to being a wallflower at social functions. Each member of the Addams Family teaches Lurch a different step.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama's paintings leave an art critic speechless, so Gomez sends for his friend, Sam Picasso, to teach Grandmama to paint in the abstract. The starving artist ignores Grandmama's and Morticia's work as he eats and paints.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Rockland Cartright III is a beatnik who crashes his motorbike into a tree and recuperates at the Addams house. Each regards the other as an oddity, although the family learns to appreciate certain aspects of Rockland's life.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Mr. Briggs, the postman, is hired by the government to do undercover work in the Addams house. While pretending to be a stamp collector, he investigates rumors that coded radio messages are being sent from the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch's tiny fire-eating mother visits and demands that Lurch's employers wait on her boy hand-and-foot after Lurch leads her to believe that it's his house. Lurch revels in the unexpected attention he gets from Morticia and Gomez.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's electrical output fails abruptly. Should they call a doctor or an electrician to bring Fester back? Morticia prescribes a bowl of porcupine mold, and both she and Gomez agree that long exposure to moon rays would be beneficial.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family would like to vacation on the moon, but the billion-dollar travel cost is slightly prohibitive. Uncle Fester volunteers $21.13 and Morticia, using Gomez's new supercomputer, suggests placing a $2,000 bet on the daily double horse race.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Cousin Itt is advocated as curator of the local zoo. Gomez uses his influence with Park Commissioner Fisk (guest star Alan Reed) to promote Itt for the job, but the zookeepers are convinced the Addamses' cousin should be confined to a cage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama (Blossom Rock) is hauled off to jail for setting up a fortune-telling booth in the Addamses' living room. Gomez (John Astin) volunteers to act as attorney, and the court session becomes a shambles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez (John Astin) loses his memory after hitting his head; he fails to recognize Morticia (Carolyn Jones) and says the house looks like a condemned museum. The Addamses take turns hitting Gomez on the head trying to help him regain his memory.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Thing disappears from his box. Failing to find a single trace of Thing, Gomez (John Astin) conducts an investigation--with all members of the household under suspicion. Also starring Carolyn Jones, Jackie Coogan, and Ted Cassidy.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Wednesday's and Pugsley's faith in Santa Claus is shaken, Uncle Fester is chosen to back up Santa in case the real St. Nick is too busy to come. However, Fester-Santa gets stuck in the chimney, so each of the other adults fills in for him.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes inconsolable when Gomez donates the family antique harpsichord to a collector. Gomez and Morticia offer Lurch a balalaika and a set of drums. When this proves unsatisfactory, Gomez and Fester decide to build a new harpsichord.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Morticia hears the stock market has crashed, she assumes that Gomez has been financially wiped out and rallies the family to help make money. Morticia gives lessons, Lurch and Fester run an escort service, and the kids run a poison drink stand.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While enjoying a moonlight picnic and snail hunt, the Addams Family is mistaken for Martians by uniformed investigators from Mysterious Space Objects Headquarters. In turn, Gomez (John Astin) and the clan regard their inquisitors with suspicion.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: An organ grinder's fugitive monkey leads Fester to believe that he has turned Pugsley into a monkey. Morticia and Gomez treat the monkey as though he were their son, welcoming him to the dinner table and giving him Pugsley's chores.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's favorite charity is having an auction--so Morticia persuades her family to part with things to sell. Donations include Wednesday's headless doll, the old flogging table, a stuffed vulture and Uncle Fester's dynamite.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The Addams Family ignores notices that their house is to be condemned to make way for a freeway. When sudden explosions cannot be traced to any member of the family but, instead, to city workmen, Gomez is forced to consider moving the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's pen pal, Madelyn, is coming to visit. Fester panics, as he has described himself as handsome, heroic and romantic. Gomez and Morticia agree that all Fester needs is a toupee and they help him make several styles.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez are worried about Cousin Itt because he spends his days sleeping and dreaming in his tiny room. They decide that Itt would make an excellent marriage counselor, and pretend to be a couple with a failing marriage.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A recording company's platter of Lurch's gravelly voice brings a screaming mob of teenage fans to the Addams house. To calm the crowd, Lurch seats himself at the harpsichord and rewards his fans with a song to end all songs.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Taken in by a psychologist's pronouncement that the only happily married couples are those who fight members of the Addams household devise schemes to start a battle between Gomez (John Astin) and Morticia (Carolyn Jones).

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Gomez decides to bolster Cousin Itt's failing ego by making him the star of a production aimed as a birthday surprise for Wednesday. He hires the great director, Eric von Bissell, who gives Itt elocution lessons, causing a Hollywood star complex.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: While Morticia and Gomez are celebrating their 13th wedding anniversary, she tells Wednesday and Pugsley a bedtime story of how she and Gomez first met. In this episode, Carolyn Jones plays Morticia, Morticia as a 22-year-old, and sister Ophelia.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Wednesday and Pugsley refuse to go to bed until they hear the rest of the courtship story. Morticia resumes the tale via flashback, including the ceremony beginning with Ophelia Frump, Morticia's balmy sister, as the bride.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Romance seems close for Thing, the Addams right-hand-in-a-box, when Gomez's aunt arrives for a visit accompanied by Lady Fingers, her handmaiden. Thing enjoys the visit most because it gives him a chance to hold hands with one of his own kind.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia and Gomez visit Mayor Henson to complain that their property tax is ridiculously low. After the Mayor proves his incompetence by offering a refund, Gomez is persuaded to become a candidate for the office.

programme.desc: Forensic psychologists delve into the minds of serial killers, explaining why, most often, they can be a friendly neighbor or the tenacious co-worker – the one who hides his or her dark side better than anyone else.

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Accidental deaths, suicides, disappearances, and fires; they're an everyday part of an insurance investigator's life. But cases shouldn't be taken at face value. Forensics has become a tool for exposing insurance fraud.

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.title: The New Detectives

programme.desc: Mario Arsatti claims to be an acquaintance of a good friend from Lucas' past. But it's pleasure before business. Mario has been hired to kill Lucas.

programme.desc: The lazy Jackman brother's mortgage has been foreclosed. Unfit for farming, they head to a nearby town. The family patriarch becomes marshal and deputizes his sons.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and his girlfriend discover that an old hermit is very lonely. Old Tony invites them to lunch and lets them look for arrowheads on a remote part of his land.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas and Mark decide to enter a local turkey shoot to raise money to buy a ranch.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A vengeful judge who believes Lucas was responsible for his son's death, kidnaps Mark McCain to revenge himself on Lucas.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: When Mark tries to play Cupid between Lucas and a stranger who arrives in North Fork, the girl's older brothers accuse him of trifling with her affections and challenge him to fight.
