programme.title: Marvin Hagler vs John Mugabi
programme.desc: On March 10th, 1986 Marvin Hagler and John Mugabi fought at the Caesars Palace Outdoor Arena in Las Vegas for IBF, WBA and WBC world middleweight titles while Mugabi was ranked number 1 by all three bodies the fight ended in a victory for Hagler.

programme.title: Marvin Hagler vs Thomas Hearns
programme.desc: On April 15th, 1985, Marvin Hagler fought Thomas Hearns for the undisputed Middleweight Title at Caesars Palace in Las Vegas. Hagler and Hearns absolutely went at it from the bell which ended with Hagler securing a thrilling knockout victory.

programme.title: Matthew Saad Muhammad vs Yaqui Lopez 1
programme.desc: On October 24th, 1978 Matthew Saad Muhammad fought Yaqui Lopez for the first time for Light Heavyweight titles at the Spectrum in Philidelphia, in a 15 round bout that ended in the fourteenth round securing the victory for Muhammad.

programme.title: Michael Carabajal vs Jorge Arce
programme.desc: On July 31st, 1999 Michael Carabajal faced Jorge Arce for the WBO World Light flyweight title at Plaza de Toros El Toreo in Tijuana in a 12 round bout that went 11 rounds giving the bout to Carabajal.

programme.title: Michael Carbajal vs Humberto Gonzalez 1
programme.desc: On March 13th, 1993, Michael Carbajal fought Humberto Gonzalez for the WBC and IBF Light Flyweight Titles in Las Vegas. After being knocked down twice earlier in the fight, Carbajal made an incredible comeback, knocking out Gonzalez in the 7th round.

programme.title: Micky Ward vs Alfonso Sanchez
programme.desc: On April 12th, 1997 Micky Ward and Alfonso Sanchez faced eachother at the Thomas & Mack Center in Las Vegas the 10 round bout ended after seven giving Ward the victory by technical knockout.

programme.title: Miguel Cotto vs Antonio Margarito 2
programme.desc: On December 3rd, 2011, Miguel Cotto fought Antonio Margarito in a highly anticipated championship rematch at the Madison Square Garden in New York. This time around, Cotto showed his dominance from the start and stopped Margarito in the 9th round.

programme.title: Miguel Cotto vs DeMarcus Corley
programme.desc: On February 26th, 2005 Miguel Cotto fought DeMarcus Corley for the WBO World Super Lightweight title at the Coliseo Ruben Rodriguez in Bayamon with Corley going down twice in the 5th round securing the technical knockout victory for Cotto.

programme.title: Miguel Cotto vs Delvin Rodriguez
programme.desc: On October 5th, 2013 Miguel Cotto battled Delvin Rodriguez at the Amway Center in Orlando, Fl. The originally twelve round bout lasted three rounds and ended by technical knockout in third round securing the victory for Cotto.

programme.title: Miguel Cotto vs Joshua Clottey
programme.desc: On June 13th, 2009, Miguel Cotto fought Joshua Clottey for the WBO World Welterweight Title at Madison Square Garden in New York. Despite Clottey landing more shots, Cotto was persistent with his attack, helping him earn a close split decision win.

programme.title: Miguel Cotto vs Kelson Pinto
programme.desc: On September 11th, 2004 Miguel Cotto faced Kelson Pinto at the Coliseo Jose Miguel Agrelot in Hato Rey in battle for WBO World Super lightweight titles with the bout ending halfway through in the sixth round securing the win for Cotto.

programme.title: Miguel Cotto vs Muhammad Abdullaev
programme.desc: On June 11th, 2005 Miguel Cotto faced Muhammad Abdullaev for the WBO World Super Lightweight title at Madison Square Garden in New York the twelve round bout ended in the ninth securing the victory for Cotto.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Four men break out of prison looking for revenge against Aben Starr who turned them in after their first escape attempt.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh is resting in Benson when two bounty hunters bring in a man - the mayor - dead.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A grieving father who is the town drunk hires Josh Randall with his last $30 to find his murdered son's body, but Josh's search for clues runs up against a cowardly conspiracy of silence.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: At the request of his friend's wife, Randall comes to assist and protect a war buddy in his bid for the town's mayoralty, quickly running afoul of the established political machine and its corrupt mayor and wanted sheriff.

programme.title: Wanted: Dead or Alive
programme.desc: A bounty hunter is not a hero in his own hometown, as Josh learns when he honors a dying friend's request to return his body to Cameron and the townspeople rush to judgment, believing Josh killed him for the reward money.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin is joined by his friend Ernie Backwater, an aging sheriff who is out to capture Will Tybee, a wanted fugitive who has spent his life searching for the man who murdered his son.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin is escorting a unique prisoner to a trial and certain conviction. A man who has been married seven times and murdered all of them.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin is asked by the wife of a man who is condemned to die to visit him in prison and see if new evidence can be found to clear her husband.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Paladin is hired to escort a Rani and her party across 150 miles of desert to a safe haven. The Rani is from a country fighting a civil war and she is to be the new leader if her side is victorious.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: A letter from a friend brings Paladin to a bar where he's drugged. He wakes up chained and in the company of a man with a similar story and a woman who's path they've both crossed before.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Carl Soddenberg committed a heinous, murderous act. Paladin is hired to get him to an asylum and keep the family's survivors at bay who are out for revenge.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: An art collector hires Paladin to guide him, and his strangely childlike daughter, to the camp of a reclusive sculptor.

programme.title: Have Gun Will Travel
programme.desc: Colonel Draco invites Paladin to investigate an "insurrection" over water rights. Paladin discovers that Draco was crippled eight months previously and wants revenge.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Gunman Nate Crandall murders a rancher to steal $20,000. Sheriff Hollister gets to the loot first and locks it in a safe. Determined to get the money, Crandall involves young Jim Edwards in a plot to rob the safe and take the fall for the killing.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Reverend Tuttle is aboard the stagecoach when it is robbed by three masked gunmen. Sheriff Hollister suspects Big Jim Sten, boss of a nearby town, is behind the robbery. But when the reverend and Hollister visit Sten's town, a secret is revealed.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Jett Sergeant, son of a notorious outlaw, sees Hollister kill his father in a shootout and vows he will kill the Sheriff. Clay tries to set him straight, but the youth teams up with two of his father's henchmen in a plot a murder the Sheriff.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Frank Leslie returns to Tombstone to marry the widow of the man he killed and pledges never to use guns again. But four brothers of Leslie's victim come to Tombstone intent on revenge, putting his oath to the test.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Hollister and Claibourne journey to a neighboring town and find it evacuated in anticipation of the arrival of an outlaw band. Clay and the editor are captured and the leader of the marauders is killed as a new outlaw takes command.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Sheriff Hollister has to fire a young deputy for being 'trigger-happy.' The youngster takes a job as a guard in the Saloon, where he unnecessarily guns down a popular rancher, and when Hollister orders him out of town, the young man defies him.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: A Mexican bandito, Augustine Ramirez, has been crossing the border into Tombstone Territory to prey on the ranchers and then retreating to Mexico, where international law protects him. Hollister goes undercover to infiltrate the bandit's lair.

programme.title: Tombstone Territory
programme.desc: Hollister learns that the hatchet men of a powerful Chinese society are on a mission to find a society member's girlfriend who has been hidden away by a Chinese Quarter resident. Hollister faces a type of danger unfamiliar to the West.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi faces off against another of Marik's nefarious Rare Hunters, the silent but deadly Strings.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Strings summons one of the most powerful creatures in the history of Duel Monsters: the Egyptian God Monster Slifer the Sky Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The magic card Infinite Cards allows Strings to hold an unlimited number of cards in his hand.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the sea duelist Mako Tsunami and his bevy of underwater beasts. If Joey wins, he'll have all six Locator Cards necessary to enter the Battle City Finals, but if he loses, he can kiss the finals goodbye.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mako's oceanic warrior, The Legendary Fisherman, unleashes a wave of destruction by stealthily destroying Joey's monsters from the depths of the sea. Joey has to put his skills, training, and experience to the ultimate test before he's all washed out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik, with the help of Bakura, kidnaps Joey and Tea. The Rare Hunters also kidnap Mokuba to force Yugi and Kaiba to take on tag team duelists Umbra and Lumis on top of a skyscraper. The losers will be sent plummeting into the Shadow Realm.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Lumis and Umbra systematically dismantle Yugi and Kaiba's tumultuous teamwork. Can Yugi and Kaiba learn to put their differences aside before they're sent on a one-way trip into the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba start to exhibit signs of teamwork, but it's too little too late when Umbra and Lumis summon Masked Beast Des Gardius.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi combines his magnetic monsters into the polar powerhouse Valkyrion the Magna Warrior!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters… and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Victorious: Wok Star

programme.title: Victorious: Survival of the Hottest
programme.desc: A heat wave hits LA and the gang heads for the beach in Beck's RV. But once there, they find themselves trapped inside the RV as the temperature rises. Oblivious, Cat parties it up with some cute boys.

programme.title: Victorious: Wi-Fi in the Sky
programme.desc: Tori's flight home is delayed, leaving her no time to finish a school project with her friends. She attempts to get the work done with them over video chat, but things keep getting in the way.

programme.title: Victorious: Beck Falls for Tori
programme.desc: Tori auditions for a role in a movie. But after exaggerating on her resume, she gets hired as a stunt double. When Tori finds out her stunt is falling off a building, she's not sure she can do it.

programme.title: Victorious: Helen Back Again
programme.desc: When Principal Eikner leaves Hollywood Arts, the school hires a new principal who makes all the students re-audition in order to keep their spots. Who will get kicked out?

programme.title: Victorious: Tori Gets Stuck
programme.desc: Tori Gets Stuck: Tori is excited when she gets cast as the lead in the school play, but she has to deal with her very unhappy understudy… Jade. Tori has to avoid Jade's constant sabotage so she can perform on opening night.

programme.title: Victorious: Tori Tortures Teacher
programme.desc: The kids take Sikowitz to the theater to celebrate his ten-year teaching anniversary, but the play's subject sends Sikowitz into a deep depression. Tori must cheer him up.

programme.title: Victorious: Jade Gets Crushed
programme.desc: Andre spends time with Jade working on a song and develops a crush on her. Tori tries to help him get over his crush, but nothing seems to work, and Andre has trouble keeping his feelings a secret.

programme.title: Victorious: Who Did it to Trina?
programme.desc: Trina stars in Tori's directorial debut, and there is a big accident on opening night. Lane wants to find out what went wrong. Everyone thinks it was an equipment malfunction, maybe it's sabotage.

programme.title: Victorious: Beggin' On Your Knees
programme.desc: Beggin' On Your Knees: The Full Moon Jam is coming up. The cutest boy in school wants to perform a duet with Tori, but she finds out he has a reputation. Is Tori just having trust issues, or is this guy bad news?

programme.title: Victorious: Ice Cream for Ke$ha
programme.desc: Tori has to be Trina's assistant for a month. The only way Trina will call off the bet is if Tori wins a private Ke$ha concert. Tori's friends try to save Tori and hopefully score a Ke$ha concert!

programme.title: Victorious: Prom Wrecker
programme.desc: Tori rallies the gang into having prom at Hollywood Arts, but the event ruins Jade's art project, and now she's out for revenge. Can Tori throw a successful prom, with Jade aiming to bring the whole dance down?

programme.title: Victorious: Terror on Cupcake Street
programme.desc: The kids have to build a float fast. They only have a night to drive the float to the parade. When the float breaks down in a bad neighborhood, can the kids recover and save their chance to be on TV?

programme.title: Victorious: A Christmas Tori
programme.desc: The kids have to find the perfect Secret Santa gifts for each other, because whoever gives the worst gift has to go door-to-door yodeling with Sikowitz!

programme.title: Victorious: The Breakfast Bunch
programme.desc: Tori and the gang are forced to spend a Saturday in detention after a lunch trip gone wrong. They have the whole day to learn about each other, find food, and try not to earn more detention.

programme.title: Victorious: The Worst Couple
programme.desc: Jade and Beck help Sinjin with his new game show, "The Worst Couple," but it puts their relationship to the test. Meanwhile, Tori breaks her precious Pear Phone.

programme.title: Victorious: Andre's Horrible Girl
programme.desc: Tori notices some changes in her friend Andre, whose girlfriend seems to be overbearing and controlling. Meanwhile, Jade and Cat try to earn easy money dog-sitting in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Victorious: Car, Rain, & Fire
programme.desc: Cat's favorite actress dies and she talks Tori and Jade into driving to the actress' house to hold a vigil. Meanwhile, Trina directs a play starring herself, with Beck, Andre, and Robbie.

programme.title: Victorious: Tori & Jade's Play Date
programme.desc: Tori and Jade play a married couple putting their acting abilities and uneasy friendship to the test. Meanwhile, Cat & Robbie start a service where they deliver bad news in a friendly way.

programme.title: Victorious: The Gorilla Club
programme.desc: In an effort to take more risks as an actress, Tori goes to an underground spot called "The Gorilla Club." Meanwhile, Andre and Robbie lose a very interesting bet to Jade.

programme.title: Victorious: Driving Tori Crazy
programme.desc: When a movie shoot causes a traffic jam and interferes with Tori's morning commute, she turns to her friends for help. Meanwhile, Cat becomes addicted to an email coupon service.

programme.title: Victorious: How Trina Got In
programme.desc: Andre, Jade, Cat, and Beck trade urban legends about how Trina got accepted into Hollywood Arts. Meanwhile, Tori and Robbie are stuck at Nozu unable to pay their bill.

programme.title: Victorious: Crazy Ponnie
programme.desc: A strange new student named Ponnie befriends Tori but keeps disappearing around other people. Everyone worries Tori might be losing it, but Tori suspects that something more sinister is afoot.

programme.title: Victorious: Wanko's Warehouse
programme.desc: The gang's favorite megastore is having a massive sale. In order to avoid a huge line of customers, the kids hide out in the store until it closes so they can grab what they want before it's gone.

programme.title: Victorious: The Blonde Squad
programme.desc: While wearing a blonde wig and blue contacts for a film, Cat meets a boy and they quickly hit it off. When Cat realizes he thinks her costume is real, she worries he won't like the real her.

programme.title: Victorious: The Hambone King
programme.desc: After posting a hamboning (rhythmic thigh and knee-slapping) video online, Robbie is challenged for the title of Hambone King. When Robbie is beaten, Tori agrees to help Robbie avenge his defeat.

programme.title: Victorious: Tori Goes Platinum Pt. 1
programme.desc: Tori gets an opportunity to perform a song at a big awards program, but she's pushed into altering everything about herself in the process.

programme.title: Victorious: Tori Goes Platinum Pt. 2
programme.desc: Tori gets to sing at a big music awards show, but the producer wants to totally change her look and behavior. Tori agrees, but finds that she doesn't like her new image.
